localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.body: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
blogPost.author: Murat Aksu

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的应用程序，可以根据人们的兴趣对他们进行微分组。如果你不是特别想要约会，但又不想结识一大群阻碍你真正了解他们的人，那你就来对地方了。
localize.tagline: 根据你在微群中的兴趣结识新朋友

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的應用程序，可以根據人們的興趣對他們進行微分組。如果你不是特別想要約會，但又不想結識一大羣阻礙你真正瞭解他們的人，那你就來對地方了。
localize.tagline: 根據你在微羣中的興趣結識新朋友

previous.excerpt: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
previous.title: Ray.so by Raycast - Create beautiful images of your code

localize.description: 将你的代码变成精美的图片。从一系列的语法颜色中选择，隐藏或显示背景，并在明暗窗口之间切换。使用键盘快捷键来加快你的进程。由Raycast团队打造。
localize.tagline: 为您的代码创建美丽的图像

localize.description: 將你的代碼變成精美的圖片。從一系列的語法顏色中選擇，隱藏或顯示背景，並在明暗窗口之間切換。使用鍵盤快捷鍵來加快你的進程。由Raycast團隊打造。
localize.tagline: 爲您的代碼創建美麗的圖像

next.excerpt: SVGX is a FREE offline desktop SVG icon/asset manager and browser for Mac and Windows. Use it to quickly locate the perfect icon for your design, copy and edit the SVG code, generate repeating background CSS, and more.
next.title: SVGX - Desktop SVG asset manager for designers and developers

localize.description: SVGX是一款免费的离线桌面SVG图标/资产管理器和Mac和Windows的浏览器。使用它可以快速为您的设计找到完美的图标，复制和编辑SVG代码，生成重复的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 设计师和开发人员的桌面SVG资产管理器

localize.description: SVGX是一款免費的離線桌面SVG圖標/資產管理器和Mac和Windows的瀏覽器。使用它可以快速爲您的設計找到完美的圖標，複製和編輯SVG代碼，生成重複的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 設計師和開發人員的桌面SVG資產管理器
